name: Roller Coaster Passenger Rail Sim
description:
This Roller Coaster Passenger Rail is the latest crazy game of high speed. You feel excitement of riding on a roller coaster. This game looks easy to play but give you realistic feel and experience. Roller coaster will pick passengers and drop it at right destination. The surroundings, environment and tracks will take you to hard breathtaking journey with thrilling moments.
Enter this simulation to experience the Roller coaster game which madness in your finger tips.
Roller Coaster Game Features:-
• Different Cart Selection
• 3d graph
• Different environments
• lovely multiple sounds
• Pick and drop Passengers services
• Unlimited levels

Game Controls:-
• Use speed slider for speed acceleration control
• Realistic Control
